long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple, Faster and easier way to monitor the popular cryptocurrencies. This extension sits next to your address bar on chrome and tells you the prices of popular cryptocurrencies with a click.

This chrome extension gives you the prices from CryptoCompare API. The prices are refreshed every second without having to refresh the app.

Currently, only LiteCoin, Ripple, BitCoin, Tronix, Ethereum are listed in the extension. If you need more, send a request to bitextension@gmail.com
